Name: Rikki Kuu
About the game: Build yacht-sized space combat drones in a fully-integrated drone builder. With the help of a modular design system, just about any spaceship-looking shape can be built, relying on real physics principles to determine flight characteristics. Experience smooth zero-g flight mechanics that capture the disorienting thrills of space dogfighting while keeping the controls intuitive, simple and accessible as pure keyboard + mouse. The environment is dusty and atmospheric, which has a profound impact on the space physics involved - drones never come to a stop and are limited in speed only by how hard they can accelerate for their size. Drone building is engineered with simplicity in mind without compromising player creativity. A Drone design consists of modules and hulls. Modules offer a variety of behavior, such as thrusters and autocannons, that give a drone its basic abilities. The shape of a drone arises from the way its modules are arranged and how they're connected together with hulls.
